metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9743 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: The print_insn_score32 function in opcodes/score7-dis.c:552 in GNU Binutils2.28 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer overflowand application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via acrafted binary file, as demonstrated by mishandling of this file during"objdump -D" execution.

criterions.comment: binutils package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
